backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing presale state, recording contributions, allocations, and enforcing cap with query endpoints for status and contributor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing background‑music related feature requests, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for presale UI, hooks, utils, and background‑music system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing presale sections, animated background blobs, and the global background‑music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Floating UI component providing play, loading feedback, error messages, mute, and volume controls for background music.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Shows aggregated contributor data in a styled table with loading states and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Displays a 24‑hour countdown using neon‑styled boxes for hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Displays the presale deposit address with a copy-to-clipboard button and feedback state.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Renders the hero banner with animated visuals, headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains the steps to contribute to the presale and lists key participation details.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Shows presale progress using a progress bar and stats, with status-driven UI updates.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Combines countdown, presale parameters, progress bar, and deposit address into one section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Displays tokenomics details and a FAQ section about the project and presale.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and poll interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of authenticated or anonymous backend actors with identity-based updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Handles background music playback, user preferences, autoplay blocking, and audio lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches the list of presale contributors using the backend actor with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a hook that counts down 24 hours from first render and returns remaining hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Queries the backend actor for presale status with polling using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus custom neon-themed CSS variables and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Manages saving and loading music preferences and opt‑in state from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution records by address, summing amounts and tracking latest timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers using German-style dot thousands separators.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including custom neon variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the presale website.
